aboutView.text1: After graduating from the School of Electrical Engineering for Computer Technicians, I am currently a student at the University of the North, where I obtained a bachelor's degree in multimedia and graphic technology engineering (bacc. ing. tech. graph.). I am continuing my education at the graduate study in Multimedia. I chose this major because of my passion for programming and connecting graphic design with functionality. I am particularly interested in frontend and backend development because I believe that these are areas that shape the future.
aboutView.text2: I am currently exploring and developing websites using Vue.js for the frontend and Nest.js for the backend. Additionally, I enjoy exploring and engaging in other areas of programming, such as creating video games using Python or C#. I am interested in thoroughly studying each step of the project development process to gain knowledge and skills for independently creating larger projects. In the future, my goal is to integrate artificial intelligence tools directly into websites, enabling users to input content through prompts.

info1.title: Sveučilište Sjever Varaždin - Master's degree - Multimedia
info1.desc: We are currently focusing on developing the frontend part of websites as part of our current study, with plans to incorporate backend development as well. Additionally, we are engaged in graphical programming in Processing using the Java programming language.

info2.title: Sveučilište Sjever Varaždin - Bachelor's degree - Multimedia, design and application
info2.desc: During my undergraduate studies, I had the opportunity to familiarize myself with the theory and practical application of graphic design across various websites, applications, and media types, actively participating in their creation process from start to finish. Concurrently, I engaged in both frontend and backend programming, both within my studies and in my free time. Although my final project focused on 3D modeling and 3D printing, it did not diminish my passion for (web) programming.

info3.title: Elektrostrojarska Škola Varaždin - Computer technician
info3.desc: Troughout my high school education, I gained extensive knowledge and a solid understanding of various programming languages, algorithms, and programming paradigms. Additionally, I acquired insights into computer hardware and devices, as well as how software interfaces with and communicates with them. I also delved into the servicing and programming of computer servers. A significant portion of my studies focused on developing computer programs and mobile applications using languages such as C# and Java, alongside website development. My culminating project involved creating a video game using Python within the Godot Game Engine.

info1.title: Prolink
info1.desc: During my time at Prolink, I had the opportunity to independently work on various significant projects such as the creation and design of Lesnina XXXL and Mömax stores. Additionally, I autonomously developed 300 scenes for the Autoškola Rusan application, which is utilized by 40 thousand users monthly. My recent projects have revolved around interior and exterior design for various apartments and residential buildings, as well as the creation of animation for medical purposes.
